name: Sqwark! A Nutty Adventure
description:
Sqwark is just your average Green parrot who lives at 85 Acorn Drive.
But when some multidimensional beings show up and attempt to take every delicious nut in the world to use as fuel for their weird and wonderful contraptions, he has to do something about it.
Using his sonic boom squawking ability, Sqwark can stun enemies and move obstacles.

  • Travel across Earth and 12 weird variations of our planet from other dimensions, taking in the sights and defeating more weirder and wonderful enemies.
  • Tackle weird and wonderful enemies from multiple dimensions while solving increasing more complex puzzles.
  • Fill your ears with a glorious orchestral soundtrack.
  • Sqwark can make use of multidimensional technology the beings have left behind to get help from Sqwarks in other dimensions, each one with their own strength and weaknesses.
